subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja}} {{wp|Cloud}} [[Image:Anvil shaped cumulus panorama edit.jpg|thumb|{{lang|ja|'''雲'''}} (''kumo''): an anvil-shaped [[cumulonimbus]] '''[[cloud]]''']]
{{ja-kanjitab|くも|yomi=k}} {{IPAfont|⟨kumo1⟩}} → *{{IPAchar|/kumʷo/}} → {{IPAchar|/kumo/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=くも|-}}. Ultimately from {{inh|ja|jpx-pro|*kumo}}.
